ban.cant_ban_higher: You can't ban a user with a higher role than you.

dm.duration: You have been banned from **{{guild}}** for **{{duration}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
dm.permanent: You have been permanently banned from **{{guild}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```

success.duration: {{confirm}} **{{user}}** has been banned for **{{duration}}** (Case #{{case}}) User has been notified with a DM.
success.permanent: {{confirm}} **{{user}}** has been permanently banned (Case #{{case}}). User has been notified with a DM.

fail.duration: {{confirm}} **{{user}}** has been banned for **{{duration}}** (Case #{{case}}) User has not been notified with a DM.
fail.permanent: {{confirm}} **{{user}}** has been permanently banned (Case #{{case}}). User has not been notified with a DM.

kick.cant_kick_higher: You can't kick a user with a higher role than you.

message.dm: You have been kicked from **{{guild}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
message.success: {{confirm}} **{{user}}** has been kicked (Case #{{case}}) User has been notified with a DM.
message.fail: {{confirm}} **{{user}}** has been kicked (Case #{{case}}) User has not been notified with a DM.
